column2: b'Tottoko Hamtarou OVA 4: Hamuchanzu no Mezase! Hamuhamu Kin Medal - Hashire! Hashire! Daisakusen'

b'Considered the prequel to the fourth Hamtaro game (fifth in Japan). In this tribute to the 2004 Olympics, Hamtaro and the Ham-Hams are tasked by Prince Bo with lighting the everlasting torch to Hamcropolis. However, the Rainbow Girls will not allow this and pursue the Ham-Hams.\n\n(Source: Wikipedia)'
[b'Tottoko Hamtarou', b'Tottoko Hamtarou OVA 3: Hamuchanzu to Niji no Kuni no Oujisama - Sekai de Ichiban no Takaramono']
[b'Hamtarou', b'Koushi-kun', b'Haruna, Hiroko', b'Tongari-kun', b'Nijihamu-kun', b'Iwata, Kana', b'Cutie']
